Introduction

ShiOn is a South Korean singer under MODHAUS.

On December 24, 2023, ShiOn was introduced as the twentieth member of the girl group tripleS under MODHAUS. She first released the single "Just Do It" as part of the sub-unit NXT, before officially debuting with tripleS on May 8, 2024, with the album "ASSEMBLE24".

As a member of tripleS, ShiOn was placed in the sub-unit NXT and Hatchi!.

Fun facts

1
ShiOn said she wants to become close with Kotone because her smile is oozing with positive energy.
…
2
Her favorite food is almost every food, among them there is fried chicken, pizza, gukbap, jjimdak, tteokbokki, burger, meat, cream bread, bread, cake, cookies, desserts, scones, ice cream, and snacks.
…
3
Her specialties are filming videos, taking and editing pictures, finding great restaurants, imitating voices, mimicating vocal tones, and decorating.
…
4
ShiOn's nicknames are 'Baby Voice' and 'Epicurean'.
…
5
ShiOn's favorite characters are Hima Noahra, Whitey (Shinchan), Petty (Poraro, the Little Penguin), Shugo Chara!, and Yumeiro Patisserie.
…
6
ShiOn's hobbies are finding great restaurants, eating delicious foods, taking pictures (but not selfies), playing the piano, watching dramas and movies, walking with a dog, and read books a little.
